name: Hoard Golem
description: The Hoard Golem is a massive construct designed as a guardian of wealth, with natural armor, impressive strength, and a body that can absorb valuable items.
memorable: It has the ability to create a whirlwind of treasures while incapacitating foes, making it a unique challenger for treasure-seekers.
goals: To protect treasure hoards and disable intruders.
relations: Often found guarding treasure vaults, it may relate to other constructs or magical guardians.
environment: Locations where vast riches are stored, like treasure hoards or vaults.
strengths: Resistance to multiple damage types and immunity to various conditions.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma limit its effectiveness in cleverness or social situations.
attacks: Can make two powerful Slam attacks, dealing heavy bludgeoning and additional force damage.
most_powerful_ability: Thieving Whirlwind can inflict significant bludgeoning damage and steal valuable objects from enemies.
senses: Has darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive perception of 14.
skills: Proficient in Athletics and has average perception skills.
additional_information: Enchanted weapons add extra force damage.
Immutable form provides immunity to alterations.
Magic resistance grants advantage against spells.
Strike with Awe ability debuffs nearby creatures.
Does not require food, air, or sleep.
test_queries: towering defender of riches and loot
